sentences.en: 'You will have heard rumours of the existence of the Brotherhood.
sentences.cn: “ 你们会听到关于存在兄弟会的传说.

sentences.en: Between human beings there are only two alternatives, either brotherhood or crime.
sentences.cn: 人与人之间的关系只有两种选择, 不是和睦相处便是尔虞我诈.

sentences.en: Men shall dwell together in true brotherhood and goodwill and joy.
sentences.cn: 在那儿人们将象真正的兄弟一样生活在一起,相亲相爱,欢乐无穷.

sentences.en: Our comradeship and our brotherhood in war were unexampled.
sentences.cn: 我们在战争年代同舟共济的兄弟情谊是史无前例的.

sentences.en: People threw flowers into the river between the two countries as a symbolic act of brotherhood.
sentences.cn: 人们把鲜花投进两国的界河里，以象征两国人民的兄弟情谊常在。

sentences.en: Soldiers who are fighting together often have a strong feeling of brotherhood.
sentences.cn: 一起作战的士兵相互间常怀有深厚的兄弟情谊.

sentences.en: The bond of brotherhood was one to last from the cradle to the grave.
sentences.cn: 兄弟之情会延续一辈子。

sentences.en: The Brotherhood cannot be wiped out because it is not an organization in the ordinary sense.
sentences.cn: 兄弟会所以不能消灭掉就是因为它不是一般观念中的那种组织.

sentences.en: Their group was called " the Brotherhood ".
sentences.cn: 他们这群人称为 “ 兄弟会 ”.

sentences.en: They live and work together in complete equality and brotherhood.
sentences.cn: 他们完全平等和兄弟般地在一起生活和工作.

sentences.en: They were of a brotherhood bound together by the ties of kin.
sentences.cn: 他们是靠血缘关系结合起来的同胞.

sentences.en: to live in peace and brotherhood
We would be bound together in a sacred brotherhood of free men.
sentences.cn: 把我们系在一起的是自由人神圣的兄弟情谊.

sentences.en: When you have read the book, you will be full members of the Brotherhood.
sentences.cn: 你们读了这本书以后, 就成了兄弟会的正式会员.

words.tran_cn: 兄弟的；兄弟般的；亲切的

phrases.tran_cn: 穆斯林兄弟会；穆斯林联盟；回教兄弟会

trans.tran_cn: 兄弟关系，手足情谊，兄弟会，（总称）同行
trans.tran_en: a feeling of friendship between people
